website_summaries.verdict: The Relment Traven from Skechers received praises from outdoorsy people, thanks to its set of features. It was well-liked for its comfiness, on-the-spot fit and sizing, and efficient waterproofing. Not to mention, it was also liked by people for its satisfying level of cushioning. It, however, failed in a couple of items. To conclude, the Skechers Relment Traven hiking boot has enough good points for it to be considered trail-ready.
pros: A majority of owners find the Skechers Relment Traven an immensely comfortable pair of hiking boots
The cushioning of this footgear is praised by a considerable number of wearers
Its true-to-width fit has earned positive remarks from a good deal of users
The Relment Traven’s warm interior has pleased a couple of outdoor lovers
Several verified purchasers comment that they like the stylish facade of this Skechers product
It is rated as a true-to-size mid-hiker by some online buyers
A couple of wearers say that the Relment Traven from Skechers is a reliable waterproof trail boot
cons: The Skechers Relment Traven dismays the minority as it tends to wear out quickly
An owner finds the outsole a bit slippery over wet surfaces

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart at the seams
customer_reviews.text: I loved these boots when I first got them - they are really comfortable. I'm a big fan of Skechers - my first choice for trainers and casual shoes. However these boots just don't cut it. The insoles wore out within a few months, so I replaced them. But within a year, thay are literally falling apart at the seams. I came to Amazon to look for a new pair of boots, and when these came up I felt compelled to leave feedback.
customer_reviews.author: DJR

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. These have been bought mainly for dog walking. My 10 year old Meindle Boots finally bought it and these are the replacements. They are well made, sturdy and comfortable with a nice memory foam insert. The biggest thing for me is that they are totally waterproof. How long for? No idea but it’s nice to have warm and dry feet for a change instead of cold and wet like I’m used to!!
customer_reviews.author: K Scott

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers I also found the boots needed breaking in. They were initially stiff to walk in but after about an hour they softened up and are now comfortable. I've not tested them in wet conditions so can't confirm how waterproof they are and I've only had them a short while so can't confirm their durability. I'll update this review at a later date but it's 5 stars for now. UPDATE: I've worn these boots in various conditions over the last 6 months and had no problems whatsoever, very happy with purchase1😀
customer_reviews.author: uncle of four

customer_reviews.title: Size not correct
customer_reviews.text: I always buy size 46 shoes/boots and they always fit perfectly. However, these boots stamped size 46 are just too small and are very difficult to do up tightly, which is required to pull my foot back as far as possible to keep my toes away from the toecap. Otherwise they are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Sorkin

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: So to start off these are standard walking boots not hiking boots 🥾 nonetheless for the price and expectation comfortable as you would expect from any sketcher my view is simple decent walking boot does the job looks ok ok for walking the dog
customer_reviews.author: Peds-68

customer_reviews.title: Stitching splitting
customer_reviews.text: The were very comfortable, initially waterproof Later stitching at toecap join is splitting and letting in water, this seems to be as a result of me bending my feet as I walk, seems unavoidable to me. I have cleaned and polished them virtually every time I have worn them which is most days of the week. Overall very disappointing if you actually want walk in them AVOID
customer_reviews.author: Dddddd

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and so comfy
customer_reviews.text: Fit beautifully. My husband has hammer toes but these are so comfy. Always buy Sketchers as you get what you expect.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Liz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product, very sturdy and supports ankle and archway of your foot. Not as lightweight as I hoped but still easy to wear. I didn’t have to bed them in wore them straightaway no problem
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: As comfy as trainers
customer_reviews.text: So pleased with my new boots. Purchased to replace a similar pair of sketchers boots. So comfortable that I’m constantly looking for an excuse to wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Snobbler

customer_reviews.title: The boots bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: On trying the boots on, the insole is very comfortable but the front and top of the boot where it ties up rubs quite a lot so a bit disappointed with them.
customer_reviews.author: John Wilde

customer_reviews.title: Quality not to Skechers usual standard
customer_reviews.text: Like the boots , unfortunately stitching around toe cap failed prematurely allowing water ingress. Decided to accept replacement boots in the hope it was a one-off quality issue Amazon have been great in resolving this problem Skechers themselves were very poor
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: They do what they are supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable from the start. Wore them in heavy rain on a 14k mountain walk. Kept my feet dry. Excellent value boot that does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bridgewater

customer_reviews.title: Once broken in they are great.
customer_reviews.text: The boots were stiff when new and needed breaking in. But within a day they had softened and become comfortable. Now, after a week they fit perfectly and are just brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Mr

customer_reviews.title: Looking good
customer_reviews.text: Laces are a little short, comfy soles, look good, just twice wearing at the moment though, looking promising.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are very good. Comfy and light and no aches and pains after first use. Glad I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Paul T

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my husband for the bad weather just been out with him in frosty weather and he is slipping all over are the soles made of plastic They are dangerous expect more for the price and from sketchers Very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected from Sketchers brand, nice surprise, I have other Sketchers products and didn't realize they did a walking boot. I am very happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Holman

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Use these for walking the dog, they are very comfortable and waterproof so far, they are leather uppers so will need waterproofing in the future, seem good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anthony Holgate

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough for the money
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish boots for hard work. Only suitable for gentle strolls. Not good enough for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb comfort and quality at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable and well made walking boots. They are very reasonable priced and are of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Buddle

customer_reviews.title: Wear and go. Comfortable walking boots
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable. Definitely waterproof. Really really pleased with my new boots
customer_reviews.author: Dinah Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots
customer_reviews.text: Fit like a glove with the Skechers memory foam insole providing a good soft walk
customer_reviews.author: IanB

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: The pair I ordered leaked where the tongue joins the shoe. Amazon kindly sent a replacement pair, but these leaked in the same place so it seems like a design issue or possibly a bad batch.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Very good boots
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these boots - comfy straight out of the box. Haven't worn them in the wet yet to comment on the waterproofing
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Sketchers your boots are rubbish
customer_reviews.text: These boots leak How the can be advertised as waterproof is a joke If you went out in just your socks you feet would stay drier
customer_reviews.author: Mr MICHAEL BOOTH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really nice fit, Not too tight and not too loose. Very sturdy shoes and I use it for daily wear and as a trek shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Harish Janardhanan

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: The only problem was there was an eye not attached , they did supply it but had to fit it ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Rochester

customer_reviews.title: disappointing
customer_reviews.text: not the size i was expecting, way too big for a size 9 and very uncomfortable even after putting an extra sole inside. not worth the £80.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Well done sketchers !
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Well made! Very comfy and feet very dry !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They arrived on time
customer_reviews.text: Boots fit perfectly arrived on time use the site again
customer_reviews.author: ianearley

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, well made, a good boot as usual from Skechers. Arrived quickly and packaged well and all at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H. V. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for walking the dogs, very comfy and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Probably most people will need larger than normal size for this boot
customer_reviews.text: A shame because a fantastic boot at a great price
customer_reviews.author: NP

customer_reviews.title: Just what hubby wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He was looking for hiking boots to take the dogs out. He's really pleased with them as they're so comfortable and are waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Pat R

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Having previously bought Skechers lightweight shoes and been impressed with both their comfort and durability, I bought these, so far so good, they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: A. Baxter

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Relment-Traven Classic Boots
product_meta.description: Forge ahead in rugged trail-ready style and comfort with the Skechers relaxed Fit®: Relment - Traven boot. Waterproof durable smooth leather and synthetic in a lace up ankle height comfort hiking style boot with stitching and overlay accents. Memory foam insole.
